```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)

load_data <- function(dir = "out/") { 
 list.files(dir, full.names = T) %>% lapply(read_csv) %>%
   dplyr::bind_rows()
}

df <- load_data()
```

```{r}
df %>% ggplot(aes(test_size, time_elapsed, group = test_case, color = test_case)) + geom_path()
```
